tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Student_Evaluations (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  method_id INT NOT NULL,
  evaluation_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
  evaluation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE StudentFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  method_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES TeachingMethods(method_id)
);

CREATE TABLE teacher_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_id INT,
  teacher_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_method_id FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES teaching_methods(method_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_teacher_id FOREIGN KEY (teacher_id) REFERENCES teachers(teacher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  grade_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
  class_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  result_date DATE,
  result_description TEXT
);
